argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | absmulrposd.1 | |- ( ph -> 0 <_ A ) |
| 2 |  | absmulrposd.2 | |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) |
| 3 |  | absmulrposd.3 | |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) |
| 4 | 2 | #P_recnd | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 5 | 3 | #P_recnd | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_absmuld | |- ( ph -> ( abs ` ( A x. B ) ) = ( ( abs ` A ) x. ( abs ` B ) ) ) |
| 7 | 2, 1 | #P_absidd | |- ( ph -> ( abs ` A ) = A ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( abs ` A ) x. ( abs ` B ) ) = ( A x. ( abs ` B ) ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( abs ` ( A x. B ) ) = ( A x. ( abs ` B ) ) ) |
